text: int * * make2darray ( int ) ; int choose ( int * * , int , int , int ) ; int main ( ) { int y ; scanf ( "%d" , & y ) ; while ( y -- ) { int * * p , i , j , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; p = make2darray ( t ) ; for ( i = t - 1 ; i > 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { p [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += ( p [ i ] [ j ] > p [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) ? p [ i ] [ j ] : p [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d" , p [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } } int * * make2darray ( int rows ) { int * * x , i , cols ; x = malloc ( rows * sizeof ( * x ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < rows ; i ++ ) { cols = i + 1 ; x [ i ] = malloc ( cols * sizeof ( * * x ) ) ; int j ; for ( j = 0 ; j < cols ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & x [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } return x ; }

int * * make2darray ( int rows ) { int * * x , i , cols ; x = malloc ( rows * sizeof ( * x ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < rows ; i ++ ) { cols = i + 1 ; x [ i ] = malloc ( cols * sizeof ( * * x ) ) ; int j ; for ( j = 0 ; j < cols ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & x [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } return x ; }
